verses.verse: His foundation <S%H3248><s%> is in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountains <S%H2042><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> more than all the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
Glorious things <S%H3513><s%> are spoken <S%H1696><s%> of you <S%H5892><s%>, O city of God <S%H430><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of Rahab <S%H7294><s%> and Babylon <S%H894><s%> to them that know <S%H3045><s%> me <S%H6429><s%>: behold Philistia, and Tyre <S%H6865><s%>, with Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>; this man was born there <S%H3205><s%>.
And of Zion <S%H6726><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%>, This and that man <S%H376><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> in her <S%H5945><s%>: and the highest himself shall establish her <S%H3559><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall count <S%H5608><s%>, when he writes up <S%H3789><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, that this man was born <S%H3205><s%> there <S%H5542><s%>. Selah.
As well the singers <S%H7891><s%> as the players <S%H2490><s%> on instruments shall be there <S%H4599><s%>: all my springs are in you.
